document_data.name: Shaggybark Tree
document_data.mainbody: '''Shaggybark tree''' was a long-living and sprawling species of [[tree]] native to the [[Malatran Plateau]] of [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Habitats: The [[saru]] village that fell under the effects of a strange curse in the Year of Discovery was built around a massive shaggybark tree.{{Cite organized play/LJ/The Soulless Shu|4}} The platform was repaired shortly after and used by the shu to perform wedding ceremonies.{{Cite organized play/LJ/The Soulless Shu|8}}
document_data.Usages: Shaggybark tree wood was an exotic export found in the city of [[Ravens Bluff]]. The elite transportation company from the City of Ravens, [[Mercury Limited]] used spokes rolled in shaggybark branches in the construction of their carriages.{{Cite polyhedron/115/Mercury Limited|8}}
